events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software developer position and will begin the review process shortly.
The application has been categorized under the engineering team for the role of software engineer specializing in backend systems.
A recruiter has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and coordinate the upcoming screening steps.
The candidate successfully completed the initial screening which focused on their software development background and problem-solving skills.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed strong enthusiasm about the engineering role.
A technical interview has been scheduled to further assess the candidate's coding skills and system design knowledge.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with the candidate demonstrating strong expertise in backend development and problem-solving.
We have scheduled an HR interview to discuss cultural fit, benefits, and other employment logistics with the candidate.
The HR interview was completed positively; the candidate aligns well with our company values and employment terms.
An offer has been proposed to the candidate including details about salary, benefits, and expected start date.
The candidate provided positive feedback on the offer and communicated their intent to accept pending final clarification on certain details.
The candidate has officially accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team as a software developer.
Onboarding has commenced with the candidate completing necessary documentation and beginning initial training sessions.
The hiring process is now closed as the candidate has successfully onboarded and started work as a software engineer.
